or layers
it means decomposing decomposing means
breaking the big problem into smaller

to solve a big problem instead of
solving a big problem at once we can
break the big problem into smaller
problems if we solve all smaller
problems and obviously the big problem

the problem into more manageable

advantages it provides more modular

well that modularity has its own
advantages where big problem is broken

that we can get the solution for the big
problem
likewise in computer networking also we

design and also it is easy to

interoperable if you don't understand
this just listen to this example suppose

important note is that the OSI model is

it is only a guideline for two different

to communicate with each other
they can follow these guidelines and
hence it is referred as the OSI
